### Government Tender Announcement: Robotic Total Stations {#government-tender-announcement-robotic-total-stations}

#### Request for Standing Offer {#request-for-standing-offer}

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for a Request for Standing Offer (RfSO) for Robotic Total Stations.

**Request Details**

*   **Reference Number**: WS4222191639 Doc4599409577
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-05-23
*   **Closing Date**: 2024-06-25T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2024-06-06
*   **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

**Scope**

The RCMP requires Robotic Total Stations for delivery of goods to its headquarters in Surrey, British Columbia. The standing offer is expected to be in place for two years, with two one-year options, to allow for on-demand ordering.

**Selection Criteria**

The award will be based on the lowest price.

**Contact Information**

*   **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
    *   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5
    *   **Contact Person**: Morton, Chris (SPAC/PSPC) (il-lui / he-him)
    *   **Email**: [chris.morton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chris.morton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information**

*   Interested suppliers can access the tender notice on the Ariba website ([https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19787657?extsite=MTk3ODc2NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19787657?extsite=MTk3ODc2NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)).
*   The tender description is available for review on the Ariba website.
*   Suppliers interested in participating should review the terms and conditions of the tender and submit their proposal according to the closing date.
